rooms.description: Entrance hall with reception area incorporating modern and traditional Chettinad elements. Includes display of local artistry.
Spacious master bedroom with Vastu-compliant east-facing windows for positive energy and a private balcony overlooking the garden. Luxury decor and built-in wardrobes.
Chettinad-inspired guest bedroom with traditional elements and modern amenities, north-facing for auspiciousness as per Vastu.
Additional bedroom designed in Chettinad style with integrated storage and light accenting; south-facing for warmth.
Well-equipped kitchen featuring open layout integrated with dining area. South-facing windows to harness natural light and proper ventilation as per Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the kitchen, spacious dining room with Chettinad ornamental designs. North-facing for balance and harmony.
Grand living area reflecting Chettinad opulence with central seating arrangement and traditional motifs; west wall reserved for the home theatre integration.
Quiet study area with built-in bookshelves and ample natural light from north-facing windows; designed to encourage productivity and calm.
Luxury ensuite bathroom for the master bedroom with modern fixtures and Vastu-compliant placement avoiding direct west alignment.
Additional guest bathroom designed in Chettinad style with tiled floors and integrated vanity.
Dedicated servant quarters with basic amenities ensuring privacy and ease of access. West-facing for service convenience as per plot orientation.

openings.description: Large archway door with intricate Chettinad detailing. South-facing to invite positive energy.
Double-glazed windows in the living area and dining room ensuring natural light while maintaining privacy.
Separate entrance for servant quarters, designed with simplicity and functionality in mind.
